Class XHtmlErrorPage

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.nasa.gsfc.spdf.ssc.XHtmlErrorPage
  • public class XHtmlErrorPage
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents an XHTML error page.
    Author:
    B. Harris

      • getHtml

        public static org.w3._1999.xhtml.Html getHtml​(java.lang.String status,
                                              java.lang.String type,
                                              java.lang.String message,
                                              java.lang.String description)
        Creates an XHTML representation of an error web page.
        Parameters:
        status - status message
        type - type of error
        message - error message. The String will be XML escaped in the resulting XHTML.
        description - detailed description. The String will be XML escaped in the resulting XHTML.
        Returns:
        XHTML representation of an error page

      • main

        public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Class tester.
        Parameters:
        args - command line arguemnts. args[0] should contain the name of the file into which to write the output XHTML
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if an Exception occurs
